ComBrand: 通用电气（中国）有限公司 GE China
JobDescribe: Business Segment  Transportation    About Us  X   Role Summary/Purpose   Essential Responsibilities  * Act as primary/lead SQE for metallic parts suppliers in China and manage a team of 5-8 SQEs * Functions as a liason between sourcing, engineering, manufacturing and suppliers to resolve quality issues related to parts and components process quality * Develops positive relationships and works closely with strategic sourcing to on-board and manage new suppliers * Proactively identifies improvement opportunities and effectively resolves issues * Facilitates and instructs SQE/suppliers in the proper use of Statistical Process Control and 6 sigma methodologies * Provides technical process support to suppliers during launch (NCI) process * Give recommendations &/or make technical process decisions to ensure defect-free process through program management * Provide supplier quality functional and cross-functional leadership, training, and mentoring * Help train SQEs and suppliers and make sure defined standards are properly applied (NCIs, CARs, audits, etc) * Drive process qualification at metallic suppliers (control plans, trial runs, process audits, etc) * Develop and manage comprehensive improvement plans with low performing suppliers in collaboration with SQEs, Engineering, and Sourcing * Develop, implement, and monitor advanced technical training and associated methods and tools * Support/drive supplier capability and capacity to meet product requirements * Manage appropriate tollgates * Drive comprehensive root cause investigations   Qualifications/Requirements  * Bachelor’s degree from accredited university or college in Engineering, Materials, or Quality related field* Minimum of 10 years’ experience in process and quality improvement within a manufacturing environment* Direct experience in metallics manufacturing or engineering field (e.g. sand casting, metal fabrication, forging, machining, etc)* Direct quality systems or process auditing experience (lead auditor certification preferred)* Demonstrated ability to document, plan, influence and manage programs across cross functional teams* Strong verbal and written communication skills* Strong interpersonal and leadership skills* Strong problem solving skills – 6 sigma/lean green belt (black belt preferred)   Desired Characteristics
